column1: The MSc Digital Marketing Management at Cardiff Metropolitan University has been designed in conjunction with theDigital Marketing Instituteand the needs of the digital industry. It will equip you with a wide range of digital and social media marketing knowledge and techniques. The aim of the degree is to develop digital marketers who can succeed at a managerial level in today's demanding digital marketing landscape.
FeesAs a postgraduate, research or part-time student, the tuition fees you are charged will depend on the course you choose to study.
1 year full time, 2 years part time
